alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mesa County through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Grand Junction, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Mesa County, including the following locations... Glade Park and Redlands. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 17 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
